sourcesContent: import { useContext } from 'react' import CartIcon from '../Cart/CartIcon' import classes from './HeaderCartButton.module.css' import cartContext from '../../store/cart-context' const HeaderCartButton = (props) => { const cartCtx = useContext(cartContext) const numberOfCartItems = cartCtx.items.reduce((curNumber, item) => { return curNumber + item.amount }, 0) return ( ) } export default HeaderCartButton
